alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:49AM CDT until June 29 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Smith County in north central Kansas... Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 349 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Almena, or 13 miles east of Norton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Long Island around 355 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Agra, Kensington and Athol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
